<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

    <entry>72295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112108</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112108</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112108</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Semafor in znaki pooblaščenih oseb</string>
            <string language="en">Semaphore and signs of official personnel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Semaphor und Zeichen des amtlichen Personals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sémaphore et signes du personnel officiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Semaphore e sinais do pessoal oficial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Semaphore e segni dei personali ufficiali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σηματοφόρος και σημάδια του επίσημου προσωπικού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Semáforo y muestras del personal oficial</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poznavanje pomena luči na semaforju in znakov pooblaščenih oseb - policistov enostavno preverimo s pomočjo učnega lista. Učenci pobarvajo semafor v skladu z opisom in položaja policista.</string>
            <string language="en">Understanding all types of lights that are present in trafficlights and understanding of all signs that can be given by official personnel (policemen,...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">semafor</string>
            <string language="en">semaphore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">luč</string>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">znak</string>
            <string language="en">sign</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">policist</string>
            <string language="en">policeman</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alle Typen Lichter, die in den trafficlights und 
anwesend sind Verstehen aller Zeichen verstehen, die vom amtlichen 
Personal (Polizisten...) gegeben werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arrangement tous les types de lumières qui sont 
présentes dans les trafficlights et l'arrangement de tous les signes 
qui peuvent être donnés par le personnel officiel (policiers...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreendendo todos os tipos de luzes que estão 
atuais nos trafficlights e de compreensão de todos os sinais que 
podem ser dados pelo pessoal oficial (polícias...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capendo tutti i tipi di luci che sono presenti 
nei trafficlights e di capire di tutti i segni che possono essere dati
dai personali ufficiali (poliziotti...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλαβαίνοντας όλους τους τύπους φώτων που είναι 
παρόντες στα trafficlights και την κατανόηση όλων των σημαδιών 
που μπορούν να δοθούν από το επίσημο προσωπικό (αστυνομικοί...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entendiendo todos los tipos de luces que están 
presentes en trafficlights y de entender de todas las muestras que se 
pueden dar por el personal oficial (policías...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Semaphor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polizist</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sémaphore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">signe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">policier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">semaphore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polícia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">semaphore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">segno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poliziotto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σηματοφόρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημάδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστυνομικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">semáforo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">muestra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">policía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
